ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: EVARCRACK REINS SUPREME!
ygData.msgSnippet: ROTFL!! The only flaw is that people get addicted and then they get irritated with Verant. But they are still addicted.. They can hate Sony and hate Verant but
ygData.messageBody:
ROTFL!!
The only flaw is that people get addicted and then they get irritated with
Verant. But they are still addicted.. They can hate Sony and hate Verant but
still be addicted and want to play.
luv,
-Su
